attributes.action: Instruct the UK Police to actively investigate credit card fraud / online auction fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request this on behalf of UK businesses who trade online or in a customer not present environment and for members of the public who increasingly are becoming victims of online auction fraud.

We respectfully submit that this can be achieved by reversing the home offices decision that these types of frauds are not to be investigated by the police as from the 1st of April 2007

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Instruct the UK Police to actively investigate credit card fraud / online auction fraud."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
